column5: LEEWARD ISLES fully furnished 950+ sq ft, 2 bedroom/2 bathroom 3d floor condo (stairs only) with lots of upgrades and Gulf view. Unit has its own ***WIFI***. Short 1 block walk to the Gulf beach. On-site pool. Schlitterbahn waterpark is less than 3 miles. Downtown Corpus Christi and all its attractions is a 25 minute drive from the complex. Port Aransas and off shore fishing is 20 minutes away.
